name: 蘇昭瑾
objective: Surface science and chemistry play important roles in many real processes: they are intimately involved in heterogeneous catalysis, in thin film production, in semiconductor devices fabrication, and in nano-technology. Over the past half century, chemists and physicists have developed elaborate instrumentation to elucidate the arrangement of the atoms on the surface, the surface composition, and the surfaces reactivity, which all impact significantly in many aspect of high-tech. related science. Therefore, I have design this course to elucidate the gas-solid interfacial phenomena, principles and techniques of surface science and its application to meet the increasing demand for analysis of solid surfaces in both the “academic” and “technological” fields.
